li.text: - Snow Trooper Cuirass, Pauldrons, Helmet and Kama - Death Trooper Cuirass, Pauldrons and Helmet - E-11D Blaster Carbine - Shore Trooper Cuirass, Pauldrons and Helmet - Imperial Jumpsuit - Imperial Gunner Helmet - Imperial Technician Helmet

There are now several new trooper types! - Snow Troopers - will show up in raids on maps with cold climates. - Death Troopers - can show up in raids and Imperial settlements, or with traders. - Imperial Gunners - Only really seen in Imperial settlements. - Imperial Technician - Also only really in settlements, small number may be with traders. - Shore Troopers - will show up in temperate maps with a beach during raids. - Imperial Pilot - Again also only seen in settlements.
These are of course all using the appropriate equipment.

- Imperial Officers and Traders now spawn with a temperature regulator so they can better survive extreme cold/hot climates. - If you have Droid Depot, KX-Series droids will now spawn in Galactic Empire settlements.
They fly now! Rebel Alliance Jump Troops have arrived, with jetpacks and a rifle. They're an uncommon troop type, so they shouldn't spawn too often.
If you have Outer Rim - Galactic Diversity or Chiss Ascnedancy enabled, there will be an extremely rare chance that a Chiss will spawn as part of the Empire.
